translations: 水滴，滴液；滴水声，滴落；（医用）滴注器；笨蛋，懦夫，平庸乏味者

phrs.translation: 滴流咖啡（使沸水慢慢渗过咖啡粉末所泡成的咖啡，等于drip grind）

sentences.sentence: She was then hooked up to an IV drip.
sentences.translation: 接着就给她接上了静脉滴注。

sentences.sentence: He was put on intravenous drip to treat his dehydration.
The silence was broken only by the steady drip, drip of water from the roof.
sentences.translation: 只有屋顶上滴答滴答持续不断的滴水声打破了寂静。
